name: Fares
description:
Fares is a young curious treasure hunter. He travels through many locations to discover and explore new areas, treasures and artifacts. During his adventures, he faces many difficulties and challenges to reach his goals.

Key Features:-
Relaxing:
"Stunning Environments"
"Catchy Music"
"Calm Rhythm"

Old school:
"Memorable Gameplay"
"Childhood Memories"

Treasure hunt:
"Collect The forgotten treasures and artifacts"

Kids focus:
"Suitable for All ages"
"Engaging Simplicity"

Challenges:
"Speedrun System"
